column4: hello, would anyone know if there is QWERZ English keyboard avail for Ubuntu 10.10?thanks
QWERZ? really, or do you mean QWERT (the default keyboard layout)
sorry for the misspelling, I meant QWERTZ
i'm sorry - i can't help - i've never even heard of QWERTZ as a keyboard layout i'm affraid.  hope someone else has an answer for you, best of luck.
thank you for your effort anyway
